summary: All requested removals/updates appear implemented: App layout ends at Skills, header/nav and hero CTAs no longer reference Gallery/Contact, and footer no longer includes a Connect section with social icons; footer quick links also exclude removed sections. One potentially unrequested addition is a Caffeine.ai attribution/UTM-tracked link in the footer.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed footer attribution linking to caffeine.ai with UTM parameters derived from window.location.hostname.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to remove the footer “Connect” area and update links to removed sections; it does not request adding or modifying third-party attribution/tracking links.
